comments.author: Crell.6401
comments.body:
It’d be cool if we could pull our current PvP League status, down to the division and pip level.

I can see some cool-guild style leaderboards developing. Or perhaps, a way to branch out and find others near your league level in guilds you’re in.

I know I’ve run into a few of our more quiet members in the lobby [And I’m usually the quiet one], and never known they were a guildie until they recognized my tag and swapped reps to say something =)

GW2Efficency could share it or make it publically viewable the same way we share inventory/build info now.
